text: The Ghost of War () is a 1988 Nicaraguan drama movie directed by Ramiro Lacayo-Deshon and starring Elmer Macfield, Alenka DÃ­az, Manuel Poveda, Pilar Aguirre, Carlos Aleman Ocampo. ==Other websites== * Category:1988 drama movies Category:Nicaraguan movies Category:Cuban movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Spanish drama movies
